mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TCI_PARAME_DEF WHERE ${SOLUTION_NAME}=${SOLUTION_ID} AND NETTYPE=${NETTYPE} AND NETYPE=${NETYPE} AND MANUFACTURE=${MANUFACTURE}
SELECT * FROM ${tableName} WHERE ${SOLUTION_NAME}=${SOLUTION_ID}
SELECT TT.* FROM TCI_PARAME_DEF T LEFT JOIN TCI_PARAME_DEF_DETAIL TT ON T.PARAID=TT.PARAMEID
${CurNetTableSql}
${sqls}
${querySql}
${querySql}
SELECT DISTINCT SOLUTION_ID FROM ${tableName}
SELECT * FROM ur_case_rule_info WHERE casecode=${casecode} AND status ='0'

SELECT INSTUCTIONCODE,RULECODE,DICTID ,CHECKLOGIC,STDPARAMTABLE,LOGTABLE,DEVICEFIELD ,CREATETIME ,CREATEUSER, MODITIME,MODIUSER ,STATUS ,REMARK,CONSTRAINTNAME ,CONSTRAINTPARAMETER,SYSKEY ,SYSVALUE,ADDSORT,DELSORT,ISACCURATECHECK,POSITION ,ISMERGE,FILTEREXPRESSION,GROUPID FROM UR_RULE_INSTRUCTION_INFO WHERE rulecode=${rulecode} AND status ='0' AND DICTID in ( select tt.DICTID from TCI_PARAME_DEF tt group by tt.DICTID )

SELECT INSTUCTIONCODE,RULECODE,DICTID ,CHECKLOGIC,STDPARAMTABLE,LOGTABLE,DEVICEFIELD ,CREATETIME ,CREATEUSER, MODITIME,MODIUSER ,STATUS ,REMARK,CONSTRAINTNAME ,CONSTRAINTPARAMETER,SYSKEY ,SYSVALUE,ADDSORT,DELSORT,ISACCURATECHECK,POSITION ,ISMERGE,FILTEREXPRESSION,GROUPID FROM UR_RULE_INSTRUCTION_INFO WHERE rulecode=#{rulecode} AND status ='0'

SELECT INSTUCTIONCODE,RULECODE,DICTID ,CHECKLOGIC,STDPARAMTABLE,LOGTABLE,DEVICEFIELD ,CREATETIME ,CREATEUSER, MODITIME,MODIUSER ,STATUS ,REMARK,CONSTRAINTNAME ,CONSTRAINTPARAMETER,SYSKEY ,SYSVALUE,ADDSORT,DELSORT,ISACCURATECHECK,POSITION ,ISMERGE,FILTEREXPRESSION,GROUPID,COMBINETYPE FROM UR_RULE_INSTRUCTION_INFO WHERE instuctioncode=#{instructioncode} AND status ='0'

SELECT a.*,b.chinesename as chineseName,b.englishname as englishName,b.paramformat as format, priority,is_sort as isSort FROM ur_rule_instruction_param a left join ur_instruction_dict_item b on a.paramdictid = b.dictid and a.paramitemid = b.itemid WHERE a.status ='0' and b.status ='0' and a.paramproperty <>'0' and instructioncode=#{instructioncode} ORDER BY priority
SELECT PRIORITY,ISTEMPLATE FROM UR_INSTRUCTION_DICT T WHERE DICTID = #{dictid}

SELECT NE_NAME NAME, VENDOR MANUFACTURE,NE_TYPE NETYPE, NET_TYPE NETTYPE, PHYSICAL_ADDR PHYSICALADDR, CORVER_ADDR CORVERADDR, CHANGE_ADDR CHANGEADDR, VERSION VERSION, PHYSICAL_NAME PHYSICANAME, MEDIA_GATE MEDIAGATE, CP_TYPE CPTYPE, SPC SPC, NE_INDEX NEINDEX,IS_VIRTUAL_NE ISVIRTUALNE FROM RES_NETWORK_ELEMENT_INFO

select ne_name as name, vendor as manufacture,ne_type as netype, net_type as nettype, physical_addr as physicaladdr, corver_addr as corveraddr, change_addr as changeaddr, version as version, physical_name as physicaname, media_gate as mediagate, cp_type as cptype, spc as spc, ne_index as neindex,is_virtual_ne as isvirtualne,province_name as province_name from res_network_element_info where ne_name in (#{name})
SELECT * FROM UR_BUSI_CASE_INFO WHERE STATUS <> '1' AND CASECODE =#{casecode}
SELECT * FROM UR_CASE_RULE_INFO WHERE CASECODE =#{casecode}
select constraintname + '|' + constraintparameter cons_key from ur_rule_instruction_info where rulecode = #{rulecode} and status = 0 group by constraintname + '|' + constraintparameter
select * from dbo.ur_rule_instruction_info where status = 0 and rulecode = #{rulecode} and constraintname + '|' + constraintparameter = #{contraintId} order by addsort ASC

SELECT p.[id],p.[instructioncode],p.[paramproperty],p.[paramtype],p.[paramdictid],p.[paramitemid], p.[chineseval],p.[englishval],p.[changename],p.[checklogic],p.[ruledesc],p.[createtime], p.[createuser],p.[moditime],p.[modiuser],p.[status],p.[remark], s.chinesename chineseName, s.englishname englishName, (select top 1 paramformat from ur_instruction_dict_item where status='0' and dictid = p.paramdictid and itemid = p.paramitemid ) format, (select top 1 priority from ur_instruction_dict_item where status='0' and dictid=p.paramdictid and itemid = p.paramitemid) priority,is_sort as isSort FROM ur_rule_instruction_param p inner join ur_instruction_dict_item s on p.paramdictid = s.dictid and p.paramitemid = s.itemid and s.status='0' and p.status='0' where instructioncode = #{instructioncode} order by s.priority
select * from ur_param_change where changename = #{changename}
select * from ur_param_variant where name = #{name} and net_type = #{net_type} and ne_type = #{ne_type} and manufacture = #{manufacture}
${operationMapSql}

SELECT id,dictid,itemid,priority,englishname,chinesename,paramformat,paramtype,status,remark,isCore,paramRemark,collectCMD FROM ur_instruction_dict_item where dictid= #{dictid} and status <>1 order by priority
${sql}
SELECT * FROM ur_param_variant where ref_class like 'Varian%'
select * from UR_COLLECT_CMDINFO where groupid = #{groupId} and collect_type=#{collectType} order by collect_no
SELECT * FROM TAI_INAS_ORDER_SOAP WHERE COMN_ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
SELECT name FROM USER_SLT_NES
SELECT std_table_name FROM USER_EXEC_STD
SELECT is_add_check FROM USER_OPTIONS
SELECT is_std_combine FROM USER_OPTIONS
mapper.update: UPDATE TAI_INAS_ORDER_SOAP SET TASK_ID = #{taskId} WHERE COMN_ORDER_ID = #{orderId}
UPDATE TAI_INAS_SUBTASK SET CHECK_TASK_ID = #{taskId} WHERE SUBTASK_ID = #{subTaskId}
